1.3.0: `Webhook Trigger` has been added as a new version of the Webhook component, removing the `response` input port.
`Webhook` with the `response` input port is now deprecated. Use the `Webhook Trigger` component instead.
1.4.0: Post: Added support for custom multipart/form-data allowing to send files.
1.4.1: Post: fix the form-data name for the input type: file. File input name is now correctly set.
1.4.2: Put and Post both now support binary data as input.
